name: sagittarius
content:
Add to word list

a large constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a centaur (= half human, half horse) shooting an arrow: The planet orbits a red dwarf star in Sagittarius.
[ C or U ] the ninth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 22 November to 22 December represented by a centaur shooting an arrow, or a person born during this period: He was born under the sign of Sagittarius. My husband is a Sagittarius.
